name: Google Sans
description: Overrides Google's Arial font with a sans-serif declaration, allowing a user's own browser settings to display the desired font. Think Google in Tahoma, Droid Sans or... (Heaven save us!) in Comic Sans!
additional_info:
v1.22 - 2017-05-06
Hangouts, as the Google Talk chat is gonna close soon :(

v1.21 - 2016-09-03
Updated: Google Search.

v1.20 - 2016-08-20
Updated: Google Search, Google Calendar.

v1.19 - 2016-01-30
Updated: picture selector dialog.

v1.18 - 2016-01-03
Updated: Google Search and Plus notifications. Happy new year :)

v1.17 - 2015-11-11
Updated: Drive and Calendar minor updates and fixes.

v1.16 - 2015-01-10
Updated: Google Drive minor updates.

v1.15 - 2014-04-02
Updated: new draggable app menu popup.

v1.14 - 2014-03-22
Fix: GMail inline search results.

v1.13-FIXED - 2013-12-04
Sorry, somehow 1.13 got corrupted while uploading it.

v1.13 - 2013-11-24 Happy Dr. Who 50th Anniversary! :)
Fix: Labels in GMail default view.

v1.12 - 2013-11-04
Fix: +Yourname css changed yet again.

v1.11 - 2013-10-31
Fix: Calendar guests (guest list and selection menu)
Fix: global <button> elements.

v1.10 - 2013-10-30
Updated to latest G+ notification panel.

v1.9 - 2013-10-18
Fixed: Google "Welcome to the new way[...]" popup.

v1.8 - 2013-10-14
New: YouTube
Fixed: "Loading" message, labels in "new event" popup in calendar.

v1.7 - 2013-10-09
New: Google Hangout now sux less, but I'll still be using the old GTalk in GMail until they pry it from my cold hands...

v1.6 - 2013-10-03
New: Google Search results are now handled too (how could I miss them until now?)

v1.5 - 2013-10-03
New Google "OneGoogleBar", replacing the old black header.
Finally fixed Google Calendar item and calendar display once and for all!

v1.4 - 2013-07-28
Fixed Google Calendar item and calendar display.

v1.3 - 2012-11-01
New (experimental?) integrated "Compose" and "Reply" editor in GMail.

v1.2 - 2012-10-02
Some Google Plus specific fixes.

v1.1 - 2012-09-29
Added !important declarations.

v1.0 -
Works well w/ Gmail, Google Calendar, Google Reader.
Other sites (docs, drive, ...) haven't been accurately optimized yet. They may work fine and they may show some inconsistences.
